name: The Gift of the Golden Witch
name_original: The Gift of the Golden Witch
description:
In winter 2020, the Higucord fan server had a contest to create fan works based on 07th Expansion properties with the theme of "wintertime!"  I immediately had an idea for a Umineko forgery in which "Christmas magic" was the gameboard.  The project quickly got away from me in scope and size and the result is this VN, created with Creative Commons and public domain assets, and built with Tyranobuilder.

You will need to be an Umineko fan to get what's going on - in fact you will have at least needed to read to the Answer Arcs to see what I'm up to, and potentially you will need to have read through Episode 7 to really get a full perspective into what the game is about.

The executable you want is GiftWitch1.exe.

For information on the assets used in the game, check out "assets.txt" in the ZIP folder.

There is also something else in there you might find of interest after you play. An "Answer Arc" of my own....

If you liked this or have a theory about the mysteries of the game, post below. And as always, thanks to everyone at 07th Expansion for Umineko and best wishes to them on what comes next.
